statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir // .cwd'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); user="${GITHUB_USER:-$(whoami)}"; dir="$cwd"; [ ${#dir} -gt 50 ] && dir="...$(basename "$cwd")"; git_info=""; if [ -d "$cwd/.git" ] || git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks symbolic-ref --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); if [ "${branch:-}" != "" ]; then dirty=""; git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks ls-files --error-unmatch -m --directory --no-empty-directory -o --exclude-standard ":/*" >/dev/null 2>&1 && dirty=" ✗"; git_info="(${branch}${dirty}) "; fi; fi; printf "\033[0;32m@%s \033[0m➜ \033[1;34m%s \033[0;36m%s\033[0m| %s" "$user" "$dir" "$git_info" "$model"
